#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int T;
	long long a,b,c,d;
	int x,y;
	long long re;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>re;
		cin>>a>>b>>c>>d;
		cin>>x>>y;
		x--;
		y--;
		while(x||y)
		{
			if(x%2==1&&y%2==1)
				re*=d;
			else if(x%2==1&&y%2==0)
				re*=c;
			else if(x%2==0&&y%2==1)
				re*=b;
			else if(x%2==0&&y%2==0)
				re*=a;
			x/=2;
			y/=2;
		}
		cout<<re<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
